attributes.action: reduce the age limit of 25 to 21 for being able to claim Working Tax Credit without having children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current polcy of only being able to claim tax credits if you are over 25 or have children is unfair and agesit. The policy discriminates against those of us who do not have children and are single. With the planed scrapping of the 10% tax band next year and below inflation increases I will earn less than I do now and can never afford to become truely independant.
